amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used to implement section 10011(b) of Public Law 111-11, regarding the California Central Valley San Joaquin River Agreement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to implement section 10011(b) of Public Law 111-11.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.
